LIBFLIAPI FLICancelExposure

(flidev_t dev)

Cancel an exposure for a given camera.

Documentation

Cancel an exposure for a given camera. This function cancels an exposure in progress by closing the shutter.
Parameters:
dev - Camera to cancel the exposure of.
Returns:
Zero on success.
Non-zero on failure.
See Also:
FLIExposeFrame
FLIGetExposureStatus
FLISetExposureTime
